plot: Pat ascends a ladder with a hod of bricks. Is approached by a Populist politician. Shows his displeasures by dropping bricks on the politician.
title: Pat vs. Populist
plot_es: Pat ascends a ladder with a hod of bricks. Is approached by a Populist politician. Shows his displeasures by dropping bricks on the politician.
plot_en: Pat ascends a ladder with a hod of bricks. Is approached by a Populist politician. Shows his displeasures by dropping bricks on the politician.
